itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday December 12, 2014
title: PODCAST: Investing in coffee
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

First up, the latest chapter in the story of how falling oil prices are affecting the global economy. Plus, a profile of a South African investor who was badly burned once by corruption in Congo. But now he’s back, figuring he’s learned a few things.

"}]
teaser: Falling oil prices, and investing in the Congo.
description: Falling oil prices, and investing in the Congo.
contentencoded: First up, the latest chapter in the story of how falling oil prices are affecting the global economy. Plus, a profile of a South African investor who was badly burned once by corruption in Congo. But now he’s back, figuring he’s learned a few things.
